const certificate = CertificateNFT.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");

clear
  console.log("✓ Transfer blocked - Soulbound working!");
} catch (error) {
  await certificate.connect(user).transferFrom(user.address, owner.address, 1);
try {
const [owner, user] = await ethers.getSigners();
// Try to transfer (should fail)
await certificate.tokenURI(1); // Should return: ipfs://QmfCNWTJVyQQ1WDhjbzbzdo1g9wpYqPEALWMjxsPqQgZBr
// Check metadata URI
await certificate.ownerOf(1); // Should return: 0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8
// Check certificate owner
await certificate.tokenIdCounter(); // Should return: 1n
// Check total certificates minted
const certificate = CertificateNFT.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const CertificateNFT = await ethers.getContractFactory("CertificateNFT");

} catch (error) {
